类 DynamicString

java.lang.Object
org.kelvinizer.dynamic.DynamicObject
org.kelvinizer.dynamic.DynamicString
所有已实现的接口:
Activatable, Drawable
public class DynamicString extends DynamicObject implements Drawable
The DynamicString class represents a dynamic string that can be moved over time according to specified motions. It extends DynamicObject and implements Drawable to provide rendering capabilities. This class encapsulates a BoundedString that contains the string data, and it allows dynamic motion along the horizontal and vertical axes.

    Constructs a DynamicString instance with the given string, font size, and starting position.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • DynamicString

      public DynamicString(String d, int stringSize, double x, double y, double width, double height)
      Constructs a DynamicString instance with the given string, font size, and bounding box dimensions.
      参数:
      d - The string data to display.
      stringSize - The size of the font for the string.
      x - The x-coordinate for the starting position of the string.
      y - The y-coordinate for the starting position of the string.
      width - The width of the bounding box for the string.
      height - The height of the bounding box for the string.

    • DynamicString

      public DynamicString(String d, int stringSize, double x, double y)
      Constructs a DynamicString instance with the given string, font size, and starting position. The bounding box will have width and height set to 0.
      参数:
      d - The string data to display.
      stringSize - The size of the font for the string.
      x - The x-coordinate for the starting position of the string.
      y - The y-coordinate for the starting position of the string.

    • DynamicString

      public DynamicString(String d, int stringSize)
      Constructs a DynamicString instance with the given string and font size. The starting position will be (0, 0), and the bounding box will have width and height set to 0.
      参数:
      d - The string data to display.
      stringSize - The size of the font for the string.

    • DynamicString

      public DynamicString(String d)
      Constructs a DynamicString instance with the given string and font size set to 0. The starting position will be (0, 0), and the bounding box will have width and height set to 0.
      参数:
      d - The string data to display.

  • 方法详细资料

    • getBoundedString

      public BoundedString getBoundedString()
      Returns the BoundedString object associated with this dynamic string, which contains the string data and its bounding box.
      返回:
      The BoundedString object representing the string data and bounds.

    • render

      public void render(Graphics2D g2d, long time)
      Renders the dynamic string using the provided Graphics2D object. The position of the string is updated based on the horizontal and vertical motions and the elapsed time.
      指定者:
      render 在类中 DynamicObject
      参数:
      g2d - The Graphics2D object used for rendering.
      time - The time in nanoseconds at which the object should be rendered.
